messages.title: Only a vote for Tom McCann is a vote for a fairer society and stronger economy
messages.content: You can't trust Labour to manage things properly: The last Labour Government spent far more money than it had, this led to the massive deficit. Tom will ensure we keep reducing the deficit in a fair way. Slough's Labour MP voted for Tony Blair's Â£8 billion war in Iraq. Tom McCann opposed Blair's expensive illegal war.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keep reducing the deficit in a fair way.
Demand Labour sort themselves out and finish the job.

issues.economy: Keep reducing the deficit in a fair way.
issues.socialWelfare: In Government the Lib Dems have cut the deficit left by Labour and cut tax for workers whilst boosting pensions.

housing.content: Labour's Heart of Slough redevelopment has taken years and still isn't finished.

contactInformation.address: Slough Lib Dems, 149 Weekes Drive, Slough SL1 2YW

images.caption: Tom McCann outside Slough train station.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes options to donate or volunteer for the campaign with QR codes.
